mapper.insert: insert into member (member_num, member_id, member_name, member_pw, member_addr, member_birth, member_email, gender, member_regist, member_phone) values (#{memberNum}, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberPw}, #{memberAddr}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberEmail}, #{gender}, #{memberRegist}, #{memberPhone})
mapper.select: select member_num memberNum, member_id memberId, member_pw memberPw, member_name memberName, member_addr memberAddr, member_birth memberBirth, member_phone memberPhone, member_regist memberRegist, gender, member_email memberEmail from member order by member_num desc
